form.unsubscribeTitle: Aap Notes ke liye subscribed hain

subscribeErrors.invalidNumber: Apka phone number amaanya prateet hota hai. Kriya jo bhi error hai usko theek karein aur firse prayas kariye.
subscribeErrors.internal: WhatsApp ko subscribe karne mein error aa raha hai. Kripya dubara prayas kariye aur agar yeh error firse aye toh humari <contactLink>Bloom team ko message kariye</contactLink>.
subscribeErrors.alreadyExists: Apke user ke liye WhatsApp subscription pehle se he ho rakha hai. Yadi yeh ek galti hai, toh kripya <contactLink>Bloom team ko message kariye</contactLink>.

unsubscribeErrors.internal: WhatsApp se unsubscribe karne mein error aa raha hai. Kripya dubara prayas kariye aur agar yeh error firse aye toh humari <contactLink>Bloom team ko message kariye</contactLink>.

notes.title: Bloom se Notes ke liye sign up karein
notes.description: Healing ka raasta akela aur kabhi-kabhi kathin ho sakta hai. Hamare Bloom se Notes hafte mein do baar aane wale reminders, encouragement, affirmations, aur hamare courses se activities hain, jo seedhe aapke phone par bheje jaate hain taaki aapki healing journey mein madad mil sake.
notes.createAccountDescription: Bloom se Notes ke liye sign up karein aur hamari resources ki platform tak pahunch prapt karein.
notes.howItWorks: Bloom se Notes kaise kaam karte hain
notes.step1: Hum aapke WhatsApp number par messages bhejte hain
notes.step2: Har hafte do baar, har Budhvaar aur Ravivaar
notes.step3: Hum affirmations, activities aur reflections share karte hain
notes.step4: Agar aap apna mann badlein toh kisi bhi samay unsubscribe kar sakte hain
notes.subscribeDescription: WhatsApp messages prapt karna shuru karne ke liye Bloom se Notes ke liye subscribe karein. Yahan kabhi bhi unsubscribe karein.
notes.unsubscribeDescription: WhatsApp messages band karne ke liye ya apna number update karne ke liye Bloom se Notes se unsubscribe karein. Kabhi bhi dobara subscribe kar sakte hain.
